alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Itasca and south central Koochiching Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1029 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oslund, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Itasca and south central Koochiching Counties, including the following locations... Sand Lake, Spring Lake, Whitefish Lake, Rosy, Max, Grand Falls, Craigville, Cut Foot Sioux Lake, Wirt and Dixon Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
